titleStmt.title: Archæologiæ græcæ: or, The antiquities of Greece. By John Potter, M.A. and Fellow of Lincoln College, Oxon
titleStmt.author: Potter, John, 1673 or 4-1747.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed at the theatre, for Timothy Child at the White-Hart, and John Jones at the Dolphin and Crown, in St. Paul's Church-yard, London,

notesStmt.note: Work contains second title page: Archæologiæ græcæ: or, the antiquities of Greece. Volume the second: containing I. The military affairs of the Grecians: II. Some of their miscellany customs. Imprint is the same.
Imperfect: v. 1 lacking in filmed copy. See Wing (2nd ed.) P3031 for vol. 1.
Work has 3 different indexes in English, Greek, and Latin at end of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Edinburgh University Library.
